feed.title: Kiran's Portfolio and Ramblings: Posts tagged 'scheme'

entry.title: Scheming
entry.content: I recently switched to using emacs as my default text editor primarily because I was fascinated by org-mode. I’ve been enjoying messing around with lisps, escpecially scheme. Racket has been a wonderful playground and I’ve been using it to create all kinds of little tools. It has become my python replacement.
